name: Things They Say (Part 1)
description:
Explore darkness from a perspective different from your own.

*Use headphones. Most sounds are mixed low.*

CONTROLS:

Arrows to move

Shift to run

Move close to an item to pick it up

After picking up an item, use Z to attack

Hold down Up to progress when character is not visible

NOTE:

Check the "Game-Breaking Things" thread below to avoid anything that may cause the game to stop working, as I'm learning to better use Construct 2.

P.S.:

This is my first game so please give me your honest feedback! It is most definitely in progress and I will be adding levels in chunks as I complete them. Everything is being done in Construct 2.
